duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the HRBP function of the company by working with a team of HRBP of varied different Units, reporting into you.
Responsible for providing strategic direction, guiding and facilitating a robust support system of HRBP to business.
Build relationship of trust and respect across the business teams to facilitate effective coaching and guidance through HRBPs.
Manage and collaborate with cross function departments, COE, and Shared Services to support multiple business units.
Participate with business in leadership meetings, facilitate development and strategic discussion with leadership team.
Analyze trends and metrics in partnership with the HR groups to develop solutions, programs and policies specific to business unit needs.
Improve work relationships, build morale, and increase productivity and retention by working closely with management and employees.
Collaborate with leaders on all talent processes and programs utilizing talent insights and organization data to drive business outcomes.
Closely work with functional HRBPs on delivery, operating model improvements and ways of working.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in HR or Business (Master’s preferred)
